message:
Dear {{doc.applicant_name}},

We are pleased to present you with this Letter of Intent for the position of {{doc.designation}} at {{doc.company}}.

This letter outlines our intention to offer you formal employment upon fulfillment of necessary pre-employment requirements. Please find the detailed LOI document attached for your review.

The offer includes:
  • Position: {{doc.designation}}
  • Expected Start Date: {{doc.custom_expected_date_of_joining}}


To proceed, please acknowledge receipt of this letter by replying to this email. We look forward to welcoming you to our team.

Regards,
{{doc.company}} HR Team
name: LOI Letter Notification
subject: Letter of Intent - Job Offer for {{doc.applicant_name}}
